title: AjaxConfig
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/ajax

AjaxConfiglink

建立函式的設定。

Configuration for the ajax creation function.

ajax

interface AjaxConfig { url: string body?: any async?: boolean method?: string headers?: Readonly<Record<string, any>> timeout?: number user?: string password?: string crossDomain?: boolean withCredentials?: boolean xsrfCookieName?: string xsrfHeaderName?: string responseType?: XMLHttpRequestResponseType createXHR?: () => XMLHttpRequest progressSubscriber?: PartialObserver<ProgressEvent> includeDownloadProgress?: boolean includeUploadProgress?: boolean queryParams?: string | URLSearchParams | Record<string, string | number | boolean | string[] | number[] | boolean[]> | [string, string | number | boolean | string[] | number[] | boolean[]][] }

屬性link

屬性型別說明
url

透過 HTTP 請求的資源的地址。

The address of the resource to request via HTTP.
body

要傳送的 HTTP 請求的正文。

The body of the HTTP request to send.

預設情況下，這是基於 "content-type" 標頭的值進行序列化的。例如，如果 "content-type" 是 "application/json"，則正文（body）將被序列化為 JSON。如果 "content-type" 是 "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"，則傳給正文的任何物件都將被序列化為 URL，使用基於物件的鍵和值的鍵值對。在所有其它情況下，正文將直接傳遞。

This is serialized, by default, based off of the value of the "content-type" header. For example, if the "content-type" is "application/json", the body will be serialized as JSON. If the "content-type" is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", whatever object passed to the body will be serialized as URL, using key-value pairs based off of the keys and values of the object. In all other cases, the body will be passed directly.
async

是否非同步傳送請求。預設為 true。如果設定為 false，這將阻塞執行緒，直到收到 AJAX 請求回應為止。

Whether or not to send the request asynchronously. Defaults to true. If set to false, this will block the thread until the AJAX request responds.
method

用於此請求的 HTTP 方法。預設為 『GET』。

The HTTP Method to use for the request. Defaults to "GET".
headers

要應用的 HTTP 標頭。

The HTTP headers to apply.

請注意，預設情況下，RxJS 在某些條件下會新增以下標頭：

Note that, by default, RxJS will add the following headers under certain conditions:

  1. 如果未設定 "content-type" 標頭，並且 body 是 FormData，則會自動設定 "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8" 的 "content-type"。

    If the "content-type" header is NOT set, and the body is FormData, a "content-type" of "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8" will be set automatically.

  2. 如果 "x-requested-with" 標頭未設定，並且 crossDomain 設定屬性未顯式設定為 true（意味著它不是 CORS 請求），則 "x-requested-with" 標頭的值將自動設定為 "XMLHttpRequest"。此標頭通常沒有意義，由函式庫和框架在使用 XMLHttpRequest 發出 HTTP 請求時設定。

    If the "x-requested-with" header is NOT set, and the crossDomain configuration property is NOT explicitly set to true, (meaning it is not a CORS request), a "x-requested-with" header with a value of "XMLHttpRequest" will be set automatically. This header is generally meaningless, and is set by libraries and frameworks using XMLHttpRequest to make HTTP requests.
timeout

導致底層 XMLHttpRequest 超時之前的等待時間。這僅在 async 設定項尚未設定或設定為 true 時才生效。預設為 0，這是『永不超時』的慣用語。

The time to wait before causing the underlying XMLHttpRequest to timeout. This is only honored if the async configuration setting is unset or set to true. Defaults to 0, which is idiomatic for "never timeout".
user

與 HTTP 請求一起傳送的使用者憑證的使用者名

The user credentials user name to send with the HTTP request
password

與 HTTP 請求一起傳送的使用者憑證的密碼

The user credentials password to send with the HTTP request
crossDomain

是否將 HTTP 請求作為 CORS 請求傳送。預設為 false。

Whether or not to send the HTTP request as a CORS request. Defaults to false.
withCredentials

要在 CORS 請求中傳送使用者憑證，請設定為 true。要從 CORS 請求中排除使用者憑證，或者 當 CORS 回應要忽略 cookie 時，請設定為 false。

To send user credentials in a CORS request, set to true. To exclude user credentials from a CORS request, OR when cookies are to be ignored by the CORS response, set to false.

預設為 false。

Defaults to false.
xsrfCookieName

你網站的 XSRF cookie 的名稱。

The name of your site's XSRF cookie.
xsrfHeaderName

可用於傳送 XSRF cookie 的自定義標頭的名稱。

The name of a custom header that you can use to send your XSRF cookie.
responseType

可以設定它，以更改回應型別。有效值為 "arraybuffer"、"blob"、"document"、"json" 和 "text"。請注意，如果全域上下文不是 Window，則忽略 "document" 的型別（例如 XML 文件）。

Can be set to change the response type. Valid values are "arraybuffer", "blob", "document", "json", and "text". Note that the type of "document" (such as an XML document) is ignored if the global context is not Window.

預設為 "json"。

Defaults to "json".
createXHR

用於建立用來發出 AJAX 請求的 XMLHttpRequest 物件的可選工廠。這在缺少 XMLHttpRequest 的環境中或在出於某種原因希望覆蓋預設 XMLHttpRequest 的情況下很有用。

An optional factory used to create the XMLHttpRequest object used to make the AJAX request. This is useful in environments that lack XMLHttpRequest, or in situations where you wish to override the default XMLHttpRequest for some reason.

如果未提供，將使用全域範圍內的 XMLHttpRequest。

If not provided, the XMLHttpRequest in global scope will be used.

注意：此 AJAX 實現依賴於相容 XMLHttpRequest 標準的實現提供的內建序列化和 Content-Type 標頭設定，請確保你使用的任何實現都符合該標準。

NOTE: This AJAX implementation relies on the built-in serialization and setting of Content-Type headers that is provided by standards-compliant XMLHttpRequest implementations, be sure any implementation you use meets that standard.
progressSubscriber

用於觀察 HTTP 請求的上傳進度的 Observer。將發出進度事件，並在最終上傳載入事件時完成，任何 XHR 錯誤或超時都會出錯。

An observer for watching the upload progress of an HTTP request. Will emit progress events, and completes on the final upload load event, will error for any XHR error or timeout.

對於錯誤的狀態程式碼，這不會出錯。相反，它總是在 HTTP 回應回傳時完成。

This will not error for errored status codes. Rather, it will always complete when the HTTP response comes back.
includeDownloadProgress

如果為 true，將從 observable 中以 AjaxResponse 的形式發出所有下載進度和載入完成事件。下載完成的事件也將作為 AjaxResponse 發出。

If true, will emit all download progress and load complete events as AjaxResponse from the observable. The final download event will also be emitted as a AjaxResponse.

如果此屬性和 includeUploadProgress 都是 false，那麼結果 observable 中只會發出 AjaxResponse。

If both this and includeUploadProgress are false, then only the AjaxResponse will be emitted from the resulting observable.
includeUploadProgress

如果為 true，將從 observable 中以 AjaxResponse 的形式發出所有上傳進度和載入完成事件。上傳完成的事件也將作為 AjaxResponse 發出。

If true, will emit all upload progress and load complete events as AjaxResponse from the observable. The final download event will also be emitted as a AjaxResponse.

如果此屬性和 includeDownloadProgress 都是 false，那麼結果 observable 中只會發出 AjaxResponse。

If both this and includeDownloadProgress are false, then only the AjaxResponse will be emitted from the resulting observable.
queryParams

要新增到請求 URL 中的查詢字串引數。這將需要 Internet Explorer 中 URL 和 URLSearchParams 的 polyfill！

Query string parameters to add to the URL in the request. This will require a polyfill for URL and URLSearchParams in Internet Explorer!

接受查詢字串、URLSearchParams 物件、鍵/值對字典或鍵/值項目元組陣列。（本質上，它需要 new URLSearchParams 能正常接收的任何東西）。

Accepts either a query string, a URLSearchParams object, a dictionary of key/value pairs, or an array of key/value entry tuples. (Essentially, it takes anything that new URLSearchParams would normally take).

如果由於某種原因在 url 引數中有一個查詢字串，這將附加到 url 中的查詢字串，但它也會覆蓋任何完全對應的鍵的值。換句話說，/test?a=1&b=2 的 url 和 { b: 5, c: 6 } 的 queryParams 將導致形如 /test?a=1&b=5&c=6 的 url。

If, for some reason you have a query string in the url argument, this will append to the query string in the url, but it will also overwrite the value of any keys that are an exact match. In other words, a url of /test?a=1&b=2, with queryParams of { b: 5, c: 6 } will result in a url of roughly /test?a=1&b=5&c=6.
